biotools.summary: ProteinDBS takes a PDB ID or structure as input, and searches for similar protein tertiary structures using computer visualization techniques.  The superposition of structures and the aligned component of the sequence can then be viewed over the web. ProteinDBS v2.0 applies advanced feature extraction algorithms and scalable indexing techniques to achieve a fast computation time.
